attributes.action: launch a criminal investigation into the misuse of MP's expenses and instruct them to reimburse every penny
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tired of your money being used to furnish other peoples houses? And second houses? We're tired of the double standards, they are called 'public servants' for a reason, why is it one rule for them and another for the rest of society. This is a petition to demand a criminal investigation into MP's greed and the betrayal of the public trust

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
